channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2024010159
item.description:
Report X-2024010159

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A HAZMAT LEAKING PACKAGE WITH SHIPPING PAPERS AND FLAMMABLE DIAMOND LABEL WAS FOUND NEAR PD3 METRO. DESIGNATED RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING PACKAGE AND PLACE IT IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND TRANSPORTED IT TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024010143
item.description:
Report X-2024010143

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-04
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE BEGAN LEAKING ON A PACKAGE CAR SHORTLY AFTER BEING PICKED UP FROM SHIPPER. WHEN DRIVER ARRIVED BACK AT BUILDING RESPONDER PLACED PACKAGING IN SPILL TUB. EVERY BOTTLE IN PACKAGE WAS DEFECTIVE AND CRACKED UPON BEING INSPECTION. ENTIRE SHIPMENT WAS SOLIDIFIED AND DISOPOSED OF USING SCBA.

item.title: Report X-2024010122
item.description:
Report X-2024010122

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-11T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND CONSULTED WITH THE DECISION TREE ON HOW TO PROCCED WITH THE CLEAN UP. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES IN THE DECISION TREE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. LEAKER WAS DISPOSED OF FOLLOWING GUIDLINES

item.title: Report X-2024010276
item.description:
Report X-2024010276

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While a package handler was working in the IC belt, he noticed that a package was on it sided and wet. he told to his manager and they called QA,. DescribePack: One gallon got loose cap and spilled out some of the contens. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA went to the area and put the package in a tote line with a hazmat bag and brought to the processing cage.

item.title: Report X-2024010256
item.description:
Report X-2024010256

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver coded a 10. Admin found on truck laying sideways with directional arrows. Manager looked up SDS to confirm undeclared Hazmat. DescribePack: Loose caps and dented products causing leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was put right side up then transported to QA in a black tote. Once processing was completed, entire package was put in a sealed salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2024010293
item.description:
Report X-2024010293

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While a package handler was in the IC belt, he noticed that a package was leaking, he told to his manger and they called QA. DescribePack: The package got crack in the bottom seal and spilled out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA went to the area with a tote line with a hazmat bag and pick the package and bright to the processing cage.

item.title: Report X-2024010332
item.description:
Report X-2024010332

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-26
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was loaded on a P&D truck this morning. The driver said there was an odor but no one could tell where it was coming from. Upon further investigation, when the package came back to the station, the admin could see a small wet spot on the bottom of the box and after opening, saw that the seal on the bottom of the cylinder was leaking. DescribePack: There are a few dents above the seal that is leaking at the base of the cylinder. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: As soon as the admin found the source of the smell, it was immediately put in a yellow salvage drum to mitigate the smell.
